meanings.definition: People who give away a gift that they have received to someone else.
meanings.sent1: The regifters at the party were excited to see who would end up with their presents.
meanings.sent2: The regifters decided to donate the unwanted gifts to a local charity.
meanings.sent3: The regifters accidentally gave each other back the same gift they had exchanged last year.
meanings.sent4: The regifters were like busy bees, spreading joy by passing on their gifts to others.
meanings.sent5: The regifters were known in the neighborhood for their generosity and recycling of presents.

meanings.definition: The act of giving away a gift that one has received to someone else.
meanings.sent1: Regifters can help reduce waste by passing on items they don't need.
meanings.sent2: The regifters practiced the art of regifting during the holiday season.
meanings.sent3: The regifters turned gift-giving into a fun game of passing surprises around.
meanings.sent4: The regifters' circle was like a merry-go-round of presents going from one person to another.
meanings.sent5: The regifters' tradition brought smiles and laughter to all who participated.
